Package com.google.appinventor.components.common

Defines constants, helper methods, and an enumeration used throughout App Inventor.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentConstants
    Contains constants related to the persistent format of Simple components.
    HtmlEntities
    A mapping of Html entity names and their unicode codes.
    PropertyTypeConstants
    Constants for specifying which PropertyEditor should be used for modifying a property value within the Designer.
    YaVersion
    Contains constants related to Young Android system, blocks, and component version numbers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ComponentCategory
    Categories for grouping components in the palette within the Designer.

Package com.google.appinventor.components.common Description

Defines constants, helper methods, and an enumeration used throughout App Inventor.
